body: This is actually the very first doujin I've ever read.. it wasn't on nhentai, i didn't even knew about this site when i read this.. i just downloaded an app from the play store loll didn't know what i was doing and i read this.. when i read this the first time i was disgusted i actually got angry thinking like why would someone make this.. it was my first time reading a doujins and i didn't even know what a doujin was.. now I love these type of shit, Jesus Christ what happened to me.. doujins are dangerous man.. good doujin 8/10 would read again
